Text:
thx 
best media player ever 
cheees

ive tried it

pros: has that modern look and useful interface tools, clear video playback

cons: limited video file association, mostly mkv,mov,mp4 and avi

ps: i have already installed a codec pack before installing this :)
wow, splash pro iz amazing ,i've tried df'rent player like kmp,gom,vlc,bsplayer,etch,but this one is really the best

doesn't play Flash videos ://

im using wmp with klite codec pack :D

fast loading time and if im not mistaken it plays almost all media files!!
